attributes.action: Stop rejecting proposals for legitimate petitions on this website
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: For example: Various ID card related petitions have been rejected recently (obviously for political reasons. This is a hugely important issue that must not be sidelined by such blatant and clumsy attempts at consorship). Some proposals are obviously humourous in nature and should be rejected; however, legitimate petitions should be allowed, whether or not the subject has already been broached. Please note: this online petition scheme is in its infancy, and a greater degree of latitude should be allowed until the UK population becomes aware of its existence.

reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
